message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I think it would be a valuable asset to you, and this price reflects its worth.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I think that's a fair price considering the market value and the product's worth to me.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value. However, I can't go lower than $13,500.  I'm confident this price reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $13,000. That's the highest I'm willing to pay for this product.
